sentences.en: a mass of bloom on the apple trees
Azaleas bloom red as a flame.
beautiful red blooms
During the warmth of spring all the flowers bloom.
Flowers bloom in springtime.
Most roses will begin to bloom from late May.
sentences.cn: 大多数玫瑰从五月末开始开花。

sentences.en: Pretty soon the lilacs would be in bloom.
Red as fire are the flowers that bloom in May.
sentences.cn: 五月的花儿红呀么红似火.

sentences.en: Roses are in full bloom.
The almonds were in bloom.
The chrysanthemums are in bloom; some are red and some yellow.
sentences.cn: 菊花开了, 有红的,有黄的.

sentences.en: The flowers in the garden are now in full bloom.
The park is a picture when flowers are in bloom.
sentences.cn: 当鲜花盛开时,这个公园的景色美极了.

sentences.en: The peach trees are in full bloom.
The roses bloom every few days.
The roses have come into bloom.
The skin loses its youthful bloom.
sentences.cn: 皮肤失去了年轻时的光泽。

sentences.en: These dots were markers that enabled them to measure every change in the size and shape of the flower as it went from bud to bloom.
sentences.cn: 这些点作为记号可以使他们测量到百合花从花蕾到开花过程中大小和形状的每一次变化。

sentences.en: These plants bloom in spring.
They bloom for a month and fade away in no time.
sentences.cn: 它们开花为一个月的时间和逐渐消失很快。

sentences.en: This flowering plant will thrive and bloom wherever you plant it.
sentences.cn: 这种花随便你种在哪儿都能活.

sentences.en: We noticed that these women began to bloom into greater self-confidence and even to shed unhealthy relationships. At that point we knew we were onto something big.
sentences.cn: 我们注意到，这些妇女开始开花到更大的自信，甚至摆脱不健康的关系。在这一点上，我们知道我们正在做一件大事。

words.tran_cn: [机] 初轧机；从前女用灯笼裤；纰漏；开花植物

phrases.phrase: the bloom is off the rose
phrases.tran_cn: (北美)明日黄花，已失去新颖感或应时价值的事物
水发绿，水华；水藻大量繁殖；湖靛

trans.tran_cn: （常指供观赏的）花，健康有精神的面貌
开花，变得健康/快活/自信
trans.tran_en: if a plant or a flower blooms, its flowers appear or open
if a plant or a flower blooms, its flowers appear or open
